TypeSignature.Value: public sealed class XmlAtomicValue : System.Xml.XPath.XPathItem, ICloneable
.class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit XmlAtomicValue extends System.Xml.XPath.XPathItem implements class System.ICloneable

Docs.summary: Represents the typed value of a validated XML element or attribute. The XmlAtomicValue class cannot be inherited.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.Xml.Schema.XmlAtomicValue Clone() cil managed

Docs.summary: Returns a copy of this object.
Docs.returns: An object copy of this object.

Docs.summary: Gets a value indicating whether the validated XML element or attribute is an XPath node or an atomic value.
Docs.value: if the validated XML element or attribute is an XPath node; if the validated XML element or attribute is an atomic value.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The IsNode property always returns `false`.

MemberSignature.Value: .method hidebysig newslot virtual instance object System.ICloneable.Clone() cil managed

Docs.summary: For a description of this member, see <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlAtomicValue.Clone%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
Docs.returns: Returns a copy of this object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks This member is an explicit interface member implementation. It can be used only when the <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlAtomicValue> instance is cast to an <xref:System.ICloneable> interface.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance string ToString() cil managed

Docs.summary: Gets the value of the validated XML element or attribute.
Docs.returns: The value of the validated XML element or attribute.

Docs.summary: Gets the current validated XML element or attribute as a boxed object of the most appropriate Microsoft .NET Framework type according to its schema type.
Docs.value: The current validated XML element or attribute as a boxed object of the most appropriate .NET Framework type.

remarks.format:
## Remarks If the value of the item is not valid according to its specified schema type, the value of the TypedValue property is equivalent to the value of the <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlAtomicValue.Value%2A> property.
For more information about type support in the <xref:System.Xml?displayProperty=fullName> namespace, see [Type Support in the System.Xml Classes](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

Docs.summary: Gets the value of the validated XML element or attribute.
Docs.value: The value of the validated XML element or attribute.

MemberSignature.Value: public override object ValueAs (Type type, System.Xml.IXmlNamespaceResolver nsResolver);
.method public hidebysig virtual instance object ValueAs(class System.Type type, class System.Xml.IXmlNamespaceResolver nsResolver) cil managed

Docs.param: The type to return the validated XML element or attribute's value as.
The <xref:System.Xml.IXmlNamespaceResolver> object used to resolve namespace prefixes.
Docs.summary: Returns the validated XML element or attribute's value as the type specified using the <xref:System.Xml.IXmlNamespaceResolver> object specified to resolve namespace prefixes.
Docs.returns: The value of the validated XML element or attribute as the type requested.

remarks.format:
## Remarks The ValueAs method attempts to convert the value of the validated XML element or attribute to the Microsoft .NET Framework type specified.
The <xref:System.Xml.IXmlNamespaceResolver> object is used to resolve namespace prefixes related to type conversions. For example, when converting an `xs:QName` to an `xs:string`.
For more information about type support in the <xref:System.Xml?displayProperty=fullName> namespace, see [Type Support in the System.Xml Classes](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

Docs.exception: The validated XML element or attribute's value is not in the correct format for the target type.
The attempted cast is not valid.
The attempted cast resulted in an overflow.

Docs.summary: Gets the validated XML element or attribute's value as a <xref:System.Boolean>.
Docs.value: The validated XML element or attribute's value as a <xref:System.Boolean>.

remarks.format:
## Remarks The ValueAsBoolean property attempts to convert the value of the validated XML element or attribute to the Microsoft .NET Framework <xref:System.Boolean> type according to the XPath 2.0 rules for casting the item's type.
For more information about type support in the <xref:System.Xml?displayProperty=fullName> namespace, see [Type Support in the System.Xml Classes](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

Docs.exception: The validated XML element or attribute's value is not in the correct format for the <xref:System.Boolean> type.
The attempted cast to <xref:System.Boolean> is not valid.

Docs.summary: Gets the validated XML element or attribute's value as a <xref:System.DateTime>.

For more information about type support in the <xref:System.Xml?displayProperty=fullName> namespace, see [Type Support in the System.Xml Classes](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

Docs.exception: The validated XML element or attribute's value is not in the correct format for the <xref:System.DateTime> type.
The attempted cast to <xref:System.DateTime> is not valid.

Docs.summary: Gets the Microsoft .NET Framework type of the validated XML element or attribute.
Docs.value: The .NET Framework type of the validated XML element or attribute. The default value is <xref:System.String>.

remarks.format:
## Remarks The ValueType property gets the .NET Framework type of the typed value of the validated XML element or attribute.
For example, an element of type `xs:int` would have a ValueType of <xref:System.Int32> by default. However, the ValueType could be any one of the valid types that can be mapped to `xs:int`, such as <xref:System.Int16> or <xref:System.Double>.
For more information about type support in the <xref:System.Xml?displayProperty=fullName> namespace, see [Type Support in the System.Xml Classes](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

Docs.summary: Gets the for the validated XML element or attribute.
Docs.value: The for the validated XML element or attribute.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The XmlType property gets the <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaType> for the validated XML element or attribute. For example, the <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSimpleType> or <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaComplexType>.
